hero.title: Kokand University
hero.quote: There is no salvation in the world except knowledge

welcomeCard.title: Welcome!
welcomeCard.description: Career Development and Employment Support Center for Graduates

about.title: About the Center
about.subtitle: Discover your dreams with us!
about.description1: Following the instructions given by the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan during the video conference held on August 8, 2025, the 'Career Development and Employment Support Center for Graduates' was established to ensure that Kokand University graduates can easily find their place in the service market and work in decent positions in their specialties in the future.

employment.title: Graduate Employment Statistics
employment.subtitle: Kokand University graduate employment data and analysis

future.title: Future Steps
future.subtitle: Presidential decree on supporting graduate employment

decree.title: Presidential Decree of the Republic of Uzbekistan
decree.intro: On additional measures to assist higher education institution graduates in finding employment. To ensure youth employment, strengthen labor market integration of higher education graduates, and improve the personnel training process with the participation of the private sector and commercial banks:
decree.president: President of the Republic of Uzbekistan Sh. MIRZIYOYEV

program.title: "Future Steps" Program
program.description: The Ministry of Higher Education, Science and Innovation and "O'zmilliybank" JSC approve the implementation of the "Future Steps" program aimed at assisting graduates of higher education institutions in employment:

point1.title: Business Support
point1.description: For graduating students of higher education institutions who wish to implement their business ideas, "O'zmilliybank" JSC provides full support in bringing business ideas to ready-made projects, including financing on favorable terms.

point2.title: Open Competitions
point2.description: Conducting open competitions by field among graduating and lower-level students of higher education institutions and assisting winners in employment:
point2.item1: Identifying the need for qualified specialists from potential employers, including large enterprises
point2.item2: Financing initial professional training measures based on individual professional education programs
point2.item3: Creating opportunities for internships at production facilities and short-term courses at foreign universities

implementation.title: Implementation
implementation.point1: The program is implemented through "Future Steps" centers organized by "O'zmilliybank" JSC in regions, including on an outsourcing basis
implementation.point2: All higher education institutions are program participants and enter into cooperation agreements with the centers

funding.title: Program Funding
funding.amount1: $80 million equivalent for 10 years, including a 3-year grace period at the Central Bank's base rate
funding.amount2: $20 million equivalent for financing student professional training and internship expenses on a grant basis

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with us for any questions or information

footer.aboutText: Established in 2019, Uzbekistan's leading private higher education institution for world-class education and innovation development.

vacancy.phonePattern: Phone number must be in +998XXXXXXXXX format
